markdown:
Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 27 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 [Graveknight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3030) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 179 1.1 **Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20 **Str** +7 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +5 **Items** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2786) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=50)_, [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24) --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +19 **Will** +18 **HP** 175 (rejuvenation, [void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83) (page 360)) **Immunities** bleed, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) **Sacrilegious Aura** 30 feet. [Counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) modifier +17
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _frost greatsword_ +24 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d12+10 slashing plus 1d6 cold **Melee** frost fist +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)), **Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold **Ranged** _frost composite longbow_ +21 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)) 11d6 cold, DC 29 **Graveknight's Curse** DC 33 **Phantom Mount** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) HP 58; AC 27; Fort +17, Ref +15, Will +14 **Weapon Master**
name: Graveknight

summary_markdown: Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor.
text: Graveknight Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 27 Unspecific Lore : DC 25 Specific Lore : DC 22 Graveknight Source Monster Core pg. 179 1.1 Perception +19; darkvision Languages Common, Necril Skills Athletics +23, Intimidation +22, Religion +19, Warfare Lore +20 Str +7 Dex +4 Con +4 Int +2 Wis +3 Cha +5 Items Composite Longbow (20 arrows), +1 resilient full plate , Greatsword --- AC 31 Fort +21 Ref +19 Will +18 HP 175 (rejuvenation, void healing (page 360)) Immunities bleed, cold, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Sacrilegious Aura 30 feet. Counteract modifier +17 Reactive Strike Reaction --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action frost greatsword +24 (Cold, Magical, versatile P), Damage 2d12+10 slashing plus 1d6 cold Melee Single Action frost fist +24 (Agile, Cold, Magical), Damage 2d6+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold Ranged Single Action frost composite longbow +21 (Cold, deadly d10, Magical, range increment 100 feet, Propulsive, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 cold Devastating Blast Two Actions (Arcane, Cold) 11d6 cold, DC 29 Graveknight's Curse DC 33 Phantom Mount Three Actions (Arcane) HP 58; AC 27; Fort +17, Ref +15, Will +14 Weapon Master
